Description (The Reaction): The Tank. Taking the insult on the chin and not flinching. "Is that the best you've got?"
The Dodge. Changing the subject, feigning ignorance, or hiding your true emotion. "I haven't the faintest idea what you mean."
The Glow. Being naturally likable. Insults slide off because you are simply too radiant/cool to care. "Oh, you're adorable."
The Rank. Using protocol and tradition as a shield. "One does not speak to the Crown in that tone."
The Wall. Iron will. Refusing to be baited or broken by sheer mental fortitude. "Your orders are irrelevant."
The Sense. Sensing the emotional intent behind the words and defusing it before it lands. "I know you're angry, but this isn't about me."
